question.questionText: Jorge added solid material to a container of clear colorless liquid. The mixture began to bubble. Explain why Jorge knew a chemical reaction occurred.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: Bubbling means a gas has formed. Gas is a new material. A new material indicates a reaction.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Jorge knew a chemical reaction was occurred because it started bubble.
